data.what_is: Tellody is an always-on intriguing and fun to use marketing and persuasion tool that can help small businesses flourish. It is an all-in-one, powerful, affordable and simple solution made for professionals without much time, energy and money for marketing.
data.product_description: Tellody is an always-on intriguing and fun to use marketing and persuasion tool that can help small businesses flourish. It is an all-in-one, powerful, affordable and simple solution made for professionals without much time, energy and money for marketing.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Tellody?
It is a simple survey tool that helps to interact with the audience easily. It is a professional marketing tool for small businesses. it is easy to implement and the customer support is quick and fast.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
It is simple and I don't feel anything in it to dislike.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps in direct communication with the customer. It helps to get a 360 view of the customer and audiences. a perfect digital tool for small businesses.

initial_reviews.review_title: Ideal tool for automations and campaigns to drive sales
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Tellody?
I love how you have the constructor and segments in one program. The pre-built email marketing automation workflows available are fantastic. The platform is visually appealing and generally easy to use. The user interface is extremely clean, and easy to find what you are looking for. What I enjoy the most are the tracking links and the display of statistics. I also like that the templates are very up-to-date. I love that they have so many email templates. Email marketing is a very important and direct form of communication with your customers.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
I would like to see more variations in content types. I also feel like the fonts are a bit limited. Sometimes it becomes very difficult to find and use new features.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been able to segment our customers in more detail than ever before. It also allows us to track how many returning customers are using your detailed reports. It allows us to better tailor email marketing to our existing subscribers. We are also bridging the communication gap between us and our audience. The automation and templates for emails are really useful. It is a very practical and easy-to-use product for email marketing.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Tellody?
review_question_answers.answer: I love how you have the constructor and segments in one program. The pre-built email marketing automation workflows available are fantastic. The platform is visually appealing and generally easy to use. The user interface is extremely clean, and easy to find what you are looking for. What I enjoy the most are the tracking links and the display of statistics. I also like that the templates are very up-to-date. I love that they have so many email templates. Email marketing is a very important and direct form of communication with your customers.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Tellody?
review_question_answers.answer: I would like to see more variations in content types. I also feel like the fonts are a bit limited. Sometimes it becomes very difficult to find and use new features.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We have been able to segment our customers in more detail than ever before. It also allows us to track how many returning customers are using your detailed reports. It allows us to better tailor email marketing to our existing subscribers. We are also bridging the communication gap between us and our audience. The automation and templates for emails are really useful. It is a very practical and easy-to-use product for email marketing.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Tellody?
I love how it is to use this tool to do surveys and sweepstakes. I always come back to this to start new surveys and give away gifts. Better than the othe rolatform as it gives you the flexibility to do the work.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
I actually love everything about this took! Nothing to dislike. Everything works great. However, it does need some training to get used to it. Make it more user friendly.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
We do survey management and give aways and thai tool has allowed us to aggregate data and be able to identify winners. It has definitely made us more productive.

review_question_answers.answer: We do survey management and give aways and thai tool has allowed us to aggregate data and be able to identify winners. It has definitely made us more productive.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Tellody?
It is very colorful and quite easy to use with a lot of wow moments. And it is cheap and this is the great thing about it. I am using Tellody to perform many many marketing tasks. This is single platform for surveys, vouchers, sending SMS, sending Email and landing pages. Plus sentiment analysis on my customer responses helps me identify my most valuable customers.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
You cannot delete draft campaigns in a bulk. It is difficult to do it one by one which consumes a lot of time.

Recommendations to others considering Tellody:
If you're new to email and SMS marketing, Tellody is the way to go. There are a number of template options to help you create attractive and user-friendly emails. The customer service is fantastic, even for free users, and they do a great job with their wiki to help you get set up. PLUS for the same price you get surveys, vouchers, landing pages, quizzes, sweepstakes, instant wins and the list goes on. You can not beat Tellody's offering.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tellody helped me look professional in many many aspects. From building beautiful emails, personalized texts, up to competitions, surveys, polls and vouchers.

PLUS for the same price you get surveys, vouchers, landing pages, quizzes, sweepstakes, instant wins and the list goes on. You can not beat Tellody's offering.

initial_reviews.review_title: It is perfect to boost any business.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Tellody?
Tellody allows you to create email campaigns beautifully, with custom texts and a large number of templates that adapt to everything you need. I love the creation of surveys and coupons, very essential to carry out digital marketing tasks since everything is in one place.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
The trial version is very limited but it is enough to get an idea of the potential of this software. Luckily I took a chance to buy it and I don't regret it at all, it's very good.

Recommendations to others considering Tellody:
Highly recommended, it is very nice to use and the price is very comfortable. Excellent.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
This software is used in my company to boost our sales through email marketing campaigns. We also use the surveys to know the acceptance of our customers regarding a product or service.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Tellody?
Together with Tellody, I love of it divides the characteristic, and everything is automated by it into categories. We can concentrate our messages to define to our customer base; also, the function is Tellody assesses, and it creates the opinions into a couple of sections of whether it's all right, inadequate, or sound.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
In the beginning, it took some time to become accustomed to the tools, which resulted. If Tellody needed performance in some specific locations, Therefore it might help. And Tellody's loyalty attribute might be made better if it let you utilize loyalty plot points' usage.

Recommendations to others considering Tellody:
Tellody is your all in 1 platform for promotion with much more, emails, SMS, and many polls. This makes it more comfortable to contact and interact with your classmates.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tellody is helping to combine our different advertising and marketing tools into a single stage, which makes it simpler to get every purpose under a single thing rather than having to have another platform for polls and you for sending emails out, etc.. It's also helping by demonstrating its investigation based on customer reaction, reveal our goal profile.

initial_reviews.review_title: An all in one marketing tool for any business!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Tellody?
With Tellod I really enjoy the feature of how it splits up and it automates its everything into different categories. we are able to focus our messages to specify to our client base also, the a great function is Tellody does an analysis on the survey responses it receives and it automatically categories the feedback into a few different  sections of whether it is good, bad, or okay.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
At first it took a while to get used to the advanced tools which resulted in a slow startup with the help of the support team. so it would help if Tellody had an easier functionality in certain areas. and also the loyalty feature of Tellody could be improved if it allowed you to use the use of loyalty scheme points.

Recommendations to others considering Tellody:
Tellody is the best all in one platform for marketing with surveys, emails, sms and more. This makes it that much easier to contact and interact with you clientele.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tellody is helping to consolidate our different marketing tools into one platform making it easier to access every function under one thing instead of having to have a different platform for surveys and one for sending out emails and etc... It is also helping show our specific target profile by showing its analysis based on client response.

Tellody is most versatile survey software in the market right now.There are many SMS messaging solutions out there in the market but, none can do what this software can do.it is an all in one product instead of using four other for Email campaign,SMS campaign, survey loyalty, and coupons.Smart customer experience in different channels.you can acquire customers from facebook page and respond through email and SMS. Easy to use templates and coupons to keep the customers intact.it is very easy to use and very colorful.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
i can not delete many draft campaigns in bulk.it is tedious to do it.it is very time consuming.

it has super powerful features,it is relatively cheap the monthly and and it is user friendly. we can engage customers more through SMS and email campaign.it is highly recommended for others.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
we are doing the online campaign.so, it is very much helpful as it assist us to this direction and in addition help us to listen the opinion our customers and tackle the situations.the saving is tremendous compared to
other enterprise options.

all_reviews.review_title: An all in one marketing tool for any business!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Tellody?
With Tellod I really enjoy the feature of how it splits up and it automates its everything into different categories. we are able to focus our messages to specify to our client base also, the a great function is Tellody does an analysis on the survey responses it receives and it automatically categories the feedback into a few different  sections of whether it is good, bad, or okay.

What do you dislike about Tellody?
At first it took a while to get used to the advanced tools which resulted in a slow startup with the help of the support team. so it would help if Tellody had an easier functionality in certain areas. and also the loyalty feature of Tellody could be improved if it allowed you to use the use of loyalty scheme points.

Recommendations to others considering Tellody:
Tellody is the best all in one platform for marketing with surveys, emails, sms and more. This makes it that much easier to contact and interact with you clientele.

What problems is Tellody solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tellody is helping to consolidate our different marketing tools into one platform making it easier to access every function under one thing instead of having to have a different platform for surveys and one for sending out emails and etc... It is also helping show our specific target profile by showing its analysis based on client response.
